Class ShiftDBManager

extends DBManager

      • createNewShift

        public int createNewShift(Shift shift)
        Creates new shift for a specific employee
        Parameters:
        shift -
        Returns:
        If not successful - negative number (-1) If successful - shiftID

      • bulkInsertShifts

        public boolean bulkInsertShifts(java.util.List<Shift> shifts)
        Same as createNewShift, just optimized for multiple shifts
        Parameters:
        shifts - An array containing the shifts to create
        Returns:
        True if all shifts were created

      • deleteShift

        public boolean deleteShift(int shiftId)
        Deletes a shift using the shift ID. Meant mainly for cleaning up database when running tests.
        Parameters:
        shiftId - ID of the shift to be deleted
        Returns:
        True if success

      • getShift

        public Shift getShift(int shiftId)
        Fetches a single shift
        Parameters:
        shiftId - - ID of the shift to fetch
        Returns:
        if successfull: a Shift object if failure: null

      • addEmployeeToShift

        public boolean addEmployeeToShift(ShiftUser shiftUser,
                                  int shiftId)
        Parameters:
        shiftUser - - User to add to shift
        shiftId - - ID of shift to add employee to
        Returns:
        True if employee is added to shift

      • deleteEmployeeFromShift

        public boolean deleteEmployeeFromShift(int userId,
                                       int shiftId)
        Deletes an employee from a shift.
        Parameters:
        userId - - ID of user to delete from shift
        shiftId - - ID of shift to delete user from
        Returns:
        True if employee is deleted

      • replaceEmployeeOnShift

        public boolean replaceEmployeeOnShift(int shiftId,
                                      int oldUserId,
                                      int newUserId)
        Replaces an user with another on a shift. Responsibility will not be transferred.
        Parameters:
        shiftId - The shift we want to edit
        oldUserId - The ID of the user which already is on the shift
        newUserId - THe ID of the replacement user
        Returns:
        True if the replacement was successful

        date - - Date for shift

      • getNumberOfShifts

        public int getNumberOfShifts(int userId,
                             java.sql.Date startDate,
                             java.sql.Date endDate)
        Gets number of shifts given a user from a start date to an end date
        Parameters:
        userId - - ID of user for fetched shifts
        startDate - - start date for fetched shifts
        endDate - - end date for fetched shifts
        Returns:
        int: number of shifts

      • setShiftChange

        public boolean setShiftChange(int shiftId,
                              int userId)
        Registeres if an employee wishes to change a shift
        Parameters:
        shiftId - - ID of shift you want to set shift_change true
        userId - - ID of user
        Returns:
        True if success

      • getShifts

        public java.util.ArrayList<ShiftUserAvailability> getShifts(int daysForward,
                                                            int userId,
                                                            java.sql.Date date,
                                                            int deptId)
        Gives an array with shifts for a user from a given date a number of days forward
        Parameters:
        daysForward - - int: How many days forward fetched shifts are
        userId - - ID for user
        date - - Start date for shifts fetched
        deptId - - ID for department of the shift
        Returns:
        ArrayList of ShiftUserAvailability

        endDate - The end of the period
        departmentId - The ID of the department
        Returns:
        True if there is any shifts in the period

        shiftId - - ID of fetched shift
        Returns:
        ShiftUser

      • setValidAbsence

        public boolean setValidAbsence(int userId,
                               int shiftId,
                               int validAbsence)
        Registers if an employee has been absent from a shift with a valid reason.
        Parameters:
        userId - - ID of user to set validAbsence for
        shiftId - - ID of shift to set validAbsence for
        validAbsence - - Can be set to following int: 0 - default or not registered, 1 - user has registrered, 2 - admin has approved the registration
        Returns:
        True if successful

      • getUsersFromShift

        public java.util.ArrayList<User> getUsersFromShift(int shiftId)
        Returns Array with User objects for given shift ID
        Parameters:
        shiftId - - ID for shift to fetch users from
        Returns:
        ArrayList of User - Array with User objects

      • approveShifts

        public boolean approveShifts(int[] shiftIds)
        Attempts to mark the provided shifts as approved. (Shift plan approval)
        Parameters:
        shiftIds - An array containing the IDs of the shifts to be approved
        Returns:
        True if all the shifts was approved

        private boolean isUserResponsible(int userId,
                                  int shiftId)
        Checks if a user is responsible for a shift
        Parameters:
        userId - - ID of the user
        shiftId - - ID of the shift
        Returns:
        True if user is responsible

      • setResponsibleUser

        public boolean setResponsibleUser(int shiftId,
                                  int userId,
                                  boolean isResponsible)
        Registers user as repsonsible for shift
        Parameters:
        shiftId - - ID for shift
        userId - - ID for user
        isResponsible - - True if responsible, false if not
        Returns:
        True: if successfully registered
